title: The Whole Cat and Caboodle by Sofie Ryan
description:
The Whole Cat and Caboodle by Sofie Ryan (Second Chance Cat Mystery, #01)


FIRST IN A NEW SERIES

Sarah Grayson is the happy proprietor of Second Chance, a charming shop in the oceanfront town of North Harbor, Maine. At the shop, she sells used items that she has lovingly refurbished and repurposed. But her favorite pet project so far has been adopting a stray cat she names Elvis.

Elvis has seen nine livesÃ¢â‚¬â€and then some. The big black cat with a scar across his nose turned up at a local bar when the band was playing the King of Rock and RollÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s music and hopped in SarahÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s truck. Since then, he has been her constant companion and the furry favorite of everyone who comes into the store.

And a helpful sleuth to boot! When SarahÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s elderly friend Maddie is found with the body of a dead man in her garden, the kindly old lady becomes the prime suspect in the murder. Even SarahÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s old high school flame, investigator Nick Elliot, seems convinced that Maddie was up to no good. So itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up to Sarah and Elvis to clear her friendÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s name and make sure the real murderer doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get a second chance. 

Genre: Cozy Mystery
